utils

Class Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Die

  • public class Die
extends java.lang.Object
    The Die class can be used to create a die object with a given maximum number of faces.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COMMON_MAX_FACES 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Die()
      Construct a die with a common maximum number of faces.
      Die(int maxFaces)
      Construct a new die with a given maximum number of faces.
